    "## Cluster similar Houses"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "06c79bee",

   "source": [
    "Again, on the same dataset. Cluster similar houses together. Here is the dataset https://github.com/edyoda/data-science-complete-tutorial/blob/master/Data/house_rental_data.csv.txt\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "<ol>\n",
    "    <li>Data cleaning & getting rid of irrelevant information before clustering</li>\n",
    "    <li>Finding the optimal value of k</li>\n",
    "    <li>Storing cluster to which the house belongs along with the data</li>\n",
    "</ol>\n",
    "\n",
    "\n"
   ]
